file_content.text: Now my superiors want to know when our generator repairs will be done. Why me?
The pirates were responsible for tapping the generator. They've been eliminated.
Thank you, my lord. My superiors were pleased to hear a Sith was involved.
Please accept this, my lord. It won't repay your help, but I hope you'll find it useful.
The pirates were stealing power for their own uses. They won't be doing it anymore.
Thank you. My superiors have been demanding reports on the hour.
Here. My pay packet for this month. I'd have lost much more if this went unresolved on my watch.
Those generator readouts should lead you to the thieves, and whatever they're powering.
There! Those lights are flickering again, why can no one else see it? There's another power fluctuation on the way.
I keep telling my superiors it's not our fault; someone is tapping our main generator, but they just think we're being incompetent!
Idiots. They'll take all the power. Then all the Imperial outposts are going to be left in the dark.
Perhaps this is part of some plan to overwhelm our outposts.
A prelude to an attack?
My superiors have a few theories, my lord, but nothing concrete.
If you can't handle simple power fluctuations, Lieutenant, maybe you don't belong here.
You need to do better.
My superiors ordered me to trace the problem, my lord--I'm trying.
It takes guts to steal from the Empire.
Someone's taking a risk.
And my superiors are blaming me for it!
These power fluctuations could also damage the outpost's systems beyond repair.
And we waste equipment.
That's what I keep trying to tell my superiors!
Do you know who's doing it?
Then stop them.
Our generator readout console might have some answers, but I can't check; naturally, I'm being held responsible for keeping our systems from blowing out.
Whoever's behind it--pirates, the Republic--we need to know who it is, and give them what they deserve. My superiors expect nothing less.
Leave this to me.
I can help.
You asked the right person.
Sabotage? Count me in.
Where is your generator?
I've isolated the power tap; our generator's not too far. Its readouts should show who's doing this and where.
Once you find who's responsible, wipe them out, along with whatever they're powering with our energy. I'll be waiting to pass on the good news.
Do it yourself. [Refuse quest]
A dozen outposts at risk, and my neck's on the line for it.
Just watch. Any minute now, our lights will go out again.
